settings.title: Healthy habits, delivered.
settings.description: With Utiva’s subscribe & save program, you never have to worry about running out of your Utiva!

settings.title: 25% off + free shipping
settings.content: Consistency is key to lasting results, which is why we offer 25% off all subscription orders. Your best deal starts here

settings.title: A plan that is flexible
settings.content: Skip, pause, cancel, modify - it's up to you. There is no commitment or strings attached. Edit directly in your account, you can even text us! XXX-XXX-XXXX

settings.title: Earn more Rewards points as a subscriber
settings.content: Subscribers earn more points, and can unlock VIP tiers for even greater savings that can be redeemed! Learn more about our rewards program

settings.title: Extra Perks
settings.content: You’ll have an access to extra sales and promotions

settings.content2: We apply the rigor of science and technology to the genius of nature, so that we can develop products that actually work. We’re commited to:

settings.title: Shop by targeted solutions
settings.description: For UTIs, overactive bladder, vaginal wellness and gut

settings.name: Alaina Mills
settings.title: I am so thankful for this product!
settings.description: About 3 years ago I started getting UTIs. I went from having a UTI here and there to having Chronic UTIs. Ever since I started taking Utiva a couple of months ago, I haven’t had any infections and my bladder health feels more secure and protected. I am so thankful for this product, and I am definitely going to stay on it for the rest of my life.

settings.name: Nannette
settings.title: I recommend this product
settings.description: I started these pills on the advice of my urologist and they certainly have helped. I found out that they could be purchased directly from the company and have been so pleased. Customer service is excellent with all the updated emails regarding notification of upcoming orders, shipment and potential date of delivery of the product. Would not buy these pills anywhere else. Excellent

settings.title: What are our customers saying?
settings.subtitle: Real Customers. Real Reviews.
settings.desc: We are helping over 50,000 customers proactively manage their pelvic health! See what some of them have to say.

settings.question: How long will my order take?
settings.answer: All orders are processed every night and our carriers make every effort to deliver within 2-6 business days. We provide tracking information with all orders so you can continue to monitor your shipment. Please contact us directly if you have any special instructions or if your shipment is past due so we can help you out right away.
